column4: I am having trouble in jaunty boots up fine but when i reach the desktop the screen become white and there is nothing I can do i use alt-print-k. It happens all the tim
My other laptop fails to go to the GUI desktop
Can you get to a different tty?
I tried failsafe gnome the same thing happened.
Bootup normally to the white screen and pretty ctrl+alt+F4
I can get to a terminal prompt.
no its a old install the problem started after a recent update from xorg
I tried what you suggested its just giving me a blank screen.
Well get to a terminal and enter sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
The problem is most likely with your video driver
Also, do you have an nvidia card?
No I have a intel gma x3100 the one which got left out by jaunty..
